text: Selina Jane Griffiths (born 1969) is a British actress, mostly known for her performances in sitcoms. She played Pauline Maltby in the ITV comedy series Benidorm. She is the daughter of Annette Crosbie. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors
title: Selina Griffiths
